text: The first Human Rights Arts Festival organized by Arts Council of Sri Lanka in collaboration with Human Rights Commission of Sri Lanka will be held tomorrow (10th Dec.).Preview of the Arts Festival will be held at the JDA Perera Art Gallery at Horton Place in Colombo from 4 p.m. -8 p.m. tomorrow.The festival with visual arts, music, dance and theater will be open for public on 11th-17th December from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.
title: Human Rights Arts Festival on Sunday
